abstract: Installed in a growing number of public places, so-called hearing loops filter out background noise for those with hearing aids.
snippet: Installed in a growing number of public places, so-called hearing loops filter out background noise for those with hearing aids.
lead_paragraph: A technology widely used in public places in Northern Europe has the potential to transform the lives of tens of millions of hearing-impaired adults in the United States, The Times reported on Monday.

headline.main: A Clear Channel for the Hearing-Impaired
